name: Johnny Bones: The House Always Wins
name_original: Johnny Bones: The House Always Wins
description:
Roll those bones and attack monsters in this haunted casino!

Download the .exe and .pck files to play on your desktop, or play the HTML5 in your browser.

Thanks for playing!
